page.title: 15INDUSTRY II
page.content: Much of the light industry found in this area has moved to the Temple Farm Estate in the North West of this quadrant. The Robert Leonard Group have developed a series of units ranging from 60 sq.metres to large 3000 sq.metre buildings.Car maintenance and electrical servicing occupy several of the small units whilst double glazing and heating system assembly was sited in the intermediate sized units and packaging, a D.I.Y.warehouse and building supplies were in the largest units. To the south of this estate is Stock Road.A large printing works occupies the Eastern approach to this area.There are also printing suppliers, typesetters and engravers and a variety of other light industries.
